answer_description: Here one of the two common faces (5) is in the same position, then according to the rule no (2) the remaining face with the 4 dots will be opposite to face with dots 2.

question: Two positions of a dice are shown below. When 3 points are at the bottom, how many points will be at the top?
answer_description: According to the rule (2) when 3 points are at the bottom then 4 points will be at the top.

question: From the positions of a cube are shown below, Which letter will be on the face opposite to face with 'A'?
answer_description: The letters of the adjacent faces to the face with letter A, are B, F, C and E. Hence D is the letter of the face opposite to the face with letters (A).
